categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: The Gamble was a converted freighter used by the Rebel Alliance during the Galactic Civil War. Princess Leia Organa and General Vanden Willard traveled aboard the Gamble on a mission to negotiate the purchase of materials to be used in the construction of Echo Base. After the construction of Echo Base, Gamble was brought to Tatooine and eventually turned into scrap metal for an unnamed Human Male in Mos Eisley.
